page.description: The Send Selected Files action lets you select files to send by email as attachments. You can specify specific files in the Genie, or prompt the user at run-time. Send Selected Files options.

step.description: In the first list box select either:

case.description: "Prompt for file names at runtime". Allows the user to specify the files to send using the Select Attachments Dialog Box.
"Specify the file names now". Allows you to specify the files to send using the Select Attachments Dialog Box.

step.description: Optionally, enter the message subject into the Subject field. You can also use the Expression Builder to create an expression that generates one or more email addresses.
Enter the recipient's email address or a comma delimited list of email addresses. You can also use the Expression Builder to create an expression that generates one or more email addresses.

Optionally, fill in the CC and Bcc fields. Email addresses in the CC field will receive a copy of the email. Their addresses will appear in the email header. Recipients in the Bcc field will also receive a copy, but their addresses will not appear in the header. You can also use the Expression Builder to create an expression that generates one or more email addresses.
